attributes.action: School fines for holidays or of set holidays
attributes.additional_details: HELP, teachers also cannot afford to pay for holidays on their rubbish pay outside of 6 weeks holiday. NOT ALL PARENTS CAN AFFORD HOLIDAYS IN THE 6 WEEKS HOLIDAYS
attributes.background: Stop or change school holiday as holiday prices and fine are absolutely ludicrous, or stop holiday company's pulling my eye balls out

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign:

Allow students to be taken out of school for two weeks a year without penalty
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/658365
